00025 class DiagonalConstraint

00027  public:
00029   static void ApplyConstraint(arma::mat& covariance)
00030   {
00031     // Save the diagonal only.
00032     arma::vec diagonal = covariance.diag();
00033     covariance = arma::diagmat(diagonal);
